parameters.name: EdgeCount
parameters.description: Number of edges for the flange

parameters.name: FlangeEdges
parameters.description: Array of edge to which to apply a flange

parameters.name: SketchFeatCount
parameters.description: Number of sketches for the flange

parameters.name: SketchFeat
parameters.description: Array of sketch features to use for the flange

parameters.name: BooleanOptions
parameters.description: Flange options as defined by swInsertEdgeFlangeOptions_e

parameters.name: FlangeAngle
parameters.description: Flange angle

parameters.name: FlangeRadius
parameters.description: Bend radius

parameters.name: BendPosition
parameters.description: Flange bend position as defined by swFlangePositionTypes_e

parameters.name: FlangeOffsetDist
parameters.description: Length of flange

parameters.name: ReliefType
parameters.description: Relief type as defined by swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e

parameters.name: FlangeReliefRatio
parameters.description: Relief ratio

parameters.name: FlangeReliefWidth
parameters.description: Relief width

parameters.name: FlangeReliefDepth
parameters.description: Relief depth

parameters.name: FlangeSharpType
parameters.description: Flange virtual sharp type as defined by swFlangeDimTypes_e

parameters.name: CustomBendAllowance
parameters.description: If... Then... non-NULL Pointer to ICustomBendAllowance object for which required values have been set NULL Parent bend's bend allowance is used

remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IModelDoc2::IInsertSketchForEdgeFlange
and create a profile for the flange. After creating the profile, call this method to create the flange.
